Unique Features

Outlook Rivals

User can compare strengths and weaknesses of their rival’s published teams and can act accordingly.

Match Tips

Our trustworthy partner “CricTracker” offers sports genuine information to assist users to construct strategic teams

Toss Update

Features like squad announcements, toss updates, and more helps users make accurate predictions and plan a winning strategy.

Preview Your Teams

Users can observe how well their players are performing in real-time as points are updated synchronously.

Compare With Opponents

Know your opponent and their team better with our in-depth analysis and comparison tool

Scorecard

We also provide a scoreboard for users to see where their individual players’ scores lie and how much is to be covered
